sections.heading: Exemptions; not applicable to tax sales
sections.text: Nothing in this chapter shall be considered as exempting any real or personal property from levy and sale for taxes.SourceR.S.1867, Code § 524, p. 484;R.S.1913, § 8102;C.S.1922, § 9038;C.S.1929, § 20-1556;R.S.1943, § 25-1555.AnnotationsThis section applies onl
